name: Sijie Niu
content: Sijie homepage @UJN About me News Research Members Collaborators 个人主页（中文版） East Lansing, MI Google Scholar Github ResearchGate ORCID Resume sjniu at hotmail dot com 0531-82767569 Sijie Niu Associate Professor Computational Intelligence Lab School of Information Science and Engineering, University of Jinan No. 336, West Road of Nan Xinzhuang, 250022, Jinan, China About me Hi! I am an associate professor in School of Infromation Science and Engineering at University of Jinan, and a member of CI2P LAB. I did a post-doc with Dinggang Shen in the IDEA LAB at the UNC. I completed my BS and PhD in 2007 and 2016, respectively, where I was advised by Prof. Qiang Chen. I am primarily interested in techniques for learning visual recognition models with less or no human supervision, such as weakly supervised learning, semi-supervised learning, webly supervised learning, transfer learning, and domain adaptation. My current research interests also include metric learning and its applications, visual recognition in extreme conditions, and medical image analysis.
